MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5.08pm Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:14PMonThursday 31 December 2020.
